General.Name: Ta-Yuan Cogeneration Co Ltd
General.Description: Ta-Yuan Cogeneration Company Ltd. engages in the cogeneration business in Taiwan. It also engages in operating and repairing equipment, processing waste disposal, managing incinerators, and processing refuse derived fuel. The company was incorporated in 1993 and is based in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 276, Chaoyin North Road, Taoyuan City, Taiwan, 337
